ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُوا۟ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who are aware that they will meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who realize that ultimately they shall meet their Lord and shall return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who are certain of their meeting with their Lord and their return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Who know that they have to meet their Lord, and that it is to Him they are to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (They are those) who are certain that they are going to meet their Lord, and that unto Him they are going to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who know that they shall meet their Lord and that they shall return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who reckon that they shall meet their Lord and that unto Him they are returning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who know that they will have to meet their Lord, and that unto Him they are returning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who know for certain that they will meet their Lord, and that they will return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who know that verily they are going to meet their Lord, and that verily unto Him they are going to return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who are certain that they will encounter their Lord and that they will return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who bear in mind the certainty that they are to meet their Lord, and that they are to return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (They are those) who are certain that they are going to meet their Lord, and that unto Him they are going to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who reckon that they will meet their Lord and that to Him they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who know that they will meet their Lord, and that to Him they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who are certain that they will meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:46] who reckon, who are certain, that they shall meet their Lord, at the Resurrection, and that to Him they are returning, in the Hereafter, where He will reward them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: who know that they will have to meet their Lord) see Him, (and that unto Him they are returning) after they die.
